strings.value:
PURPOSE  

Design and develop blockchain components, smart contracts, and backend services for Hypha projects.   

ACCOUNTABILITIES   

\- Lead the design of Hypha applications, especially related to blockchain components.  

\-Listen to Hypha community members, and translate proposals into technological solutions.  

\-Ensure Hypha maintains strong principles relating to security and decentralization.  

\-Develop and test smart contracts and related backend services.  

\-Contribute to definition of tokenomic and game theoretical algorithms to further the goals of Hypha.  

\-Develop integrations with the greater Telos and EOSIO ecosystem.  

\-Good understanding of using cryptography material such as certificates for identity management in order to authenticate members, transactions etc.  

\-Deep knowledge of EOSIO blockchains, including consensus and operations.  

\-Create security architecture for managing security of Blockchain and related applications.  

\-Ability to architect and design integration architecture for integrating applications with Blockchain and, also, participant organizations and their member nodes to Blockchain networks.  

\-Ability to document designs and clearly present ideas to the Hypha community.

\-Excellent understanding of source control, devops, Gitlab CI/CD, etc.  Excellent C++ skills, JavaScript/TypeScript a strong bonus.  

\-Manage the Hypha Open Source projects, including evaluating and approving merge requests.  

DOMAIN  

\-Hypha Tech Strategy, especially EOSIO blockchain components  

\-Smart Contracts, Backend Services, and UI integration points  

\-Dev Ops
